Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Am able to recieve feedback prior to submission whereas had to wait for teacher feedback often times weeks or months after submission

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response:
Found GenAi feedback far easier to obtain and without any feeling of criticism 
Overall felt more positive about GenAi feedback
